name: Generative Art Final
description: Creating a randomly generated moving picture using recursive functions

name: Spheres Wallpaper
description: Creates randomized wallpapers of colored spheres by manually rendering each pixel of the screen.

name: Abstract Clock
description: I used the current date and time to create a clock that abstractly represents time.

name: Exercise 1.1
description: Creating a pattern manually using p5.js (I struggled not using loops!!!)

name: Exercise 0.0
description: My first attempt at getting a p5.js project on GitHub

description: Colorful visual program to demonstrate randomness and animation

description: Generative Art with a randomized branching pattern

description: Demonstrating simple bouncing and wrappings of moving objects

name: Exercise 3.1
description: Creating a "Button" to determine the shape of an object

name: Drawing Panel
description: A very simple drawing canvas that allows the user to select colors and draw

description: Exercise demonstrating the use of loops to draw an image

name: Exercise 4.1
description: An exercise demonstrating additional control of loops

name: Pattern Wallpaper
description: Using many, many loops to create a hard-to-look-at wallpaper

name: Exercise 5.0
description: Because we totally needed more exercises on loops

name: Exercise 5.1
description: An exercise on moving the planar grid to get cool warping effects

name: Conway's Game of Life
description: Recreating an interactive Conway's Game of Life in p5.js

description: Graphically displaying a set of values in an array

description: Graphically displaying a set of objects in an array

description: Visually Representing a large amount of data regarding coding languages from StackOverflow's Developer Survey for 2021

description: Demonstrating dynamically displaying images on the board

description: Using loops to 'pixelate' an image

description: Using pixel rendering to hide a second image behind another, only showing the hidden image around the mouse

name: Exercise 8.1
description: Exercise demonstrating using mutliple objects and looping through each one

name: Descending into the dark
description: Using loops and perlin noise in a parallax effect to make the illusion of descending into a ravine.

name: Colorful Mouse Tracker
description: A project I made with a circle following the mouse and leaving a trail, changing colors based on the location

name: Connect-4
description: Implementing an AI algorithm made in another class, I made a bare-bones connect-4 game using p5.js
